00001 #include "FreeImageAlgorithms_LinearScale.h"
00002 #include "FreeImageAlgorithms_Utilities.h"

00005 #include <iostream>
00006 #include "assert.h"

00008 /*  Convert a greyscale image to a 8-bit grayscale dib.
00009  *      Convert a greyscale image to a 8-bit grayscale dib. Conversion is done using either a linear scaling from [min, max] to [0, 255]. 
00010  */
00011 template<class Tsrc>
00012 class LINEAR_SCALE
00013 {
00014 public:
00015         FIBITMAP* convert(FIBITMAP *src, double min, double max, double *min_with_image, double *max_within_image);
00016         
00017 };
00018 
00019 
00020 template<class Tdst>
00021 class STRETCH
00022 {
00023 public:
00024         FIBITMAP* StretchImageToType(FIBITMAP *src, FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type, double max);
00025 };
00026 
00027 template<class Tdst> FIBITMAP* 
00028 STRETCH<Tdst>::StretchImageToType(FIBITMAP *src, FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type, double max)
00029 {
00030         FIBITMAP *dst = NULL;
00031         unsigned x, y;
00032         
00033         double src_min_found;
00034         double src_max_found;
00035         
00036         unsigned width  = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00037         unsigned height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00038 
00039         FreeImageAlgorithms_FindMinMax(src, &src_min_found, &src_max_found);
00040 
00041         if(max == 0.0)
00042                 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetMaxPosibleValueForGreyScaleType(type, &max);
00043 
00044         double factor = max / src_max_found;
00045 
00046         dst = FreeImage_AllocateT(type, width, height, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00047 
00048         BYTE *src_bits;
00049         Tdst *dst_bits;
00050 
00051         // scale to 8-bit
00052         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00053 
00054                 src_bits = reinterpret_cast<BYTE *>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y));
00055                 dst_bits = reinterpret_cast<Tdst *>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y));
00056 
00057                 for(x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00058                         dst_bits[x] = src_bits[x] * factor;
00059                 }
00060         }
00061 
00062         return dst;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 template<class Tsrc> FIBITMAP* 
00067 LINEAR_SCALE<Tsrc>::convert(FIBITMAP *src, double min, double max, double *min_within_image, double *max_within_image)
00068 {
00069         FIBITMAP *dst = NULL;
00070         unsigned x, y;
00071                                                 
00072         unsigned width  = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00073         unsigned height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00074 
00075         // allocate a 8-bit dib
00076         dst = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_BITMAP, width, height, 8, 0, 0, 0);
00077         
00078         if(!dst)
00079                 return NULL;
00080 
00081         double scale;
00082 
00083         FreeImageAlgorithms_FindMinMax(src, min_within_image, max_within_image);
00084 
00085         // If the user has not specifed min & max use the min and max pixels in the image.
00086         if(max == 0.0 && min == 0.0) {
00087                 min = *min_within_image;
00088                 max = *max_within_image;
00089         }
00090         
00091         if(*min_within_image == *max_within_image) {
00092 
00093                 FreeImage_Unload(dst);
00094                 return FreeImage_ConvertToStandardType(src, 1);
00095         }
00096         
00097         // compute the scaling factor
00098         scale = 255.0 / (double)(max - min);
00099 
00100         Tsrc *src_bits;
00101         BYTE *dst_bits;
00102         long tmp;
00103 
00104         // scale to 8-bit
00105         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00106 
00107                 src_bits = reinterpret_cast<Tsrc*>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y));
00108                 dst_bits = FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00109 
00110                 for(x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00111 
00112                         if(src_bits[x] < min) {
00113 
00114                                 dst_bits[x] = 0;
00115                                 continue;
00116                         }
00117 
00118                         tmp = static_cast<long>(scale * (src_bits[x] - min));
00119 
00120                         if(tmp >= 255) {
00121                                 tmp = 255;
00122                         }
00123 
00124                         dst_bits[x] = (BYTE) tmp;       
00125                 }
00126         }
00127         
00128         return dst;
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 // Convert from type X to type BYTE
00133 LINEAR_SCALE<unsigned char>             scaleUCharImage;
00134 LINEAR_SCALE<unsigned short>    scaleUShortImage;
00135 LINEAR_SCALE<short>                             scaleShortImage;
00136 LINEAR_SCALE<unsigned long>             scaleULongImage;
00137 LINEAR_SCALE<long>                              scaleLongImage;
00138 LINEAR_SCALE<float>                             scaleFloatImage;
00139 LINEAR_SCALE<double>                    scaleDoubleImage;
00140 
00141 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00142 FreeImageAlgorithms_LinearScaleToStandardType(FIBITMAP *src, double min, double max, double *min_within_image, double *max_within_image)
00143 {
00144         FIBITMAP *dst = NULL;
00145 
00146         if(!src) return NULL;
00147 
00148         // convert from src_type to FIT_BITMAP
00149 
00150         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE src_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00151 
00152         switch(src_type) {
00153                 case FIT_BITMAP:        // standard image: 1-, 4-, 8-, 16-, 24-, 32-bit
00154                         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) == 8)
00155                                 dst = scaleUCharImage.convert(src, min, max, min_within_image, max_within_image);
00156                         break;
00157                 case FIT_UINT16:        // array of unsigned short: unsigned 16-bit
00158                         dst = scaleUShortImage.convert(src, min, max, min_within_image, max_within_image);
00159                         break;
00160                 case FIT_INT16:         // array of short: signed 16-bit
00161                         dst = scaleShortImage.convert(src, min, max, min_within_image, max_within_image);
00162                         break;
00163                 case FIT_UINT32:        // array of unsigned long: unsigned 32-bit
00164                         dst = scaleULongImage.convert(src, min, max, min_within_image, max_within_image);
00165                         break;
00166                 case FIT_INT32:         // array of long: signed 32-bit
00167                         dst = scaleLongImage.convert(src, min, max, min_within_image, max_within_image);
00168                         break;
00169                 case FIT_FLOAT:         // array of float: 32-bit
00170                         dst = scaleFloatImage.convert(src, min, max,  min_within_image,  max_within_image);
00171                         break;
00172                 case FIT_DOUBLE:        // array of double: 64-bit
00173                         dst = scaleDoubleImage.convert(src, min, max, min_within_image, max_within_image);
00174                         break;
00175                 case FIT_COMPLEX:       // array of FICOMPLEX: 2 x 64-bit
00176                         break;
00177         }
00178 
00179         if(NULL == dst) {
00180                 FreeImage_OutputMessageProc(FIF_UNKNOWN, "FREE_IMAGE_TYPE: Unable to convert from type %d to type %d.\n No such conversion exists.", src_type, FIT_BITMAP);
00181         }
00182 
00183         return dst;
00184 }
00185

00188 // Convert from type X to type BYTE
00189 STRETCH<unsigned char>          stretchUCharImage;
00190 STRETCH<unsigned short>         stretchUShortImage;
00191 STRETCH<short>                          stretchShortImage;
00192 STRETCH<unsigned long>          stretchULongImage;
00193 STRETCH<long>                           stretchLongImage;
00194 STRETCH<float>                          stretchFloatImage;
00195 STRETCH<double>                         stretchDoubleImage;
00196 
00197 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00198 FreeImageAlgorithms_StretchImageToType(FIBITMAP *src, FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type, double max)
00199 {
00200         FIBITMAP *dst = NULL;
00201 
00202         if(!src) return NULL;
00203 
00204         switch(type) {
00205                 case FIT_BITMAP:        // standard image: 1-, 4-, 8-, 16-, 24-, 32-bit
00206                         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) == 8)
00207                                 dst = stretchUCharImage.StretchImageToType(src, type, max);
00208                         break;
00209                 case FIT_UINT16:        // array of unsigned short: unsigned 16-bit
00210                         dst = stretchUShortImage.StretchImageToType(src, type, max);
00211                         break;
00212                 case FIT_INT16:         // array of short: signed 16-bit
00213                         dst = stretchShortImage.StretchImageToType(src, type, max);
00214                         break;
00215                 case FIT_UINT32:        // array of unsigned long: unsigned 32-bit
00216                         dst = stretchULongImage.StretchImageToType(src, type, max);
00217                         break;
00218                 case FIT_INT32:         // array of long: signed 32-bit
00219                         dst = stretchLongImage.StretchImageToType(src, type, max);
00220                         break;
00221                 case FIT_FLOAT:         // array of float: 32-bit
00222                         dst = stretchFloatImage.StretchImageToType(src, type, max);
00223                         break;
00224                 case FIT_DOUBLE:        // array of double: 64-bit
00225                         dst = stretchDoubleImage.StretchImageToType(src, type, max);
00226                         break;
00227                 case FIT_COMPLEX:       // array of FICOMPLEX: 2 x 64-bit
00228                         break;
00229         }
00230 
00231         if(NULL == dst) {
00232                 FreeImage_OutputMessageProc(FIF_UNKNOWN, "FREE_IMAGE_TYPE: Unable to convert from type %d to type %d.\n No such conversion exists.", type, FIT_BITMAP);
00233         }
00234 
00235         return dst;
00236 }
